Pantheon: This... this is the necklace I gave to Saril many months ago. Oh... Saril... Thank you for giving me this. It may not seem like much, but now that my son is dead, anything that belonged to him means a great deal to me. Sigh... You should find Grand Master Valfar in Administration. I think your work on this island is done. I think it's time you were prepared for the world.
